body: Rest in Peace E-Musu Aki, i hope all the masterpieces you've left behind become a legacy you can be proud off, my first nut of today for you.

@yy3 it's called Paying Respect, dude. We know, we don't acomplishing nothing with that, but it's a show of respect and gratitude. I met this great mangaka, in 2013, with that mamacon doujin. Since then, it was one of my favorites eromangaka, for his great art. And hit me really hard the day I realized he passed away. That's why I was paying respect in each work of him, in thanks for my bests faps (I know, very rude. But it's the truth xD)
It's kinda sad, that we only have the work he/she leaves, and no more... However, I pay my respect for this great eromangaka. /// RIP E-musu Aki sensei. Thanks for your great work, your legacy. 😎🤘
RIP Sensei... i love this art man!!! Masterpiece!
Now this is a work of art, its so good that i dont care that i cant read it.  It's still going in my favs and i must say its a crime that it is not translated.
o7 You'll be missed E-musu Aki, RIP, one of the best hentai mangaka. o7
RIP e-musu aki and I gotta say I really need this to be translated.

really wish this gets translated, this artist has really nice arts, especially the eyes and thighs

RIP he will be missed
The Fallen shall be forever be Remembered as the Emperors Finest.
the 11th tankoubon to my e-musu aki's collection

if I know how mangkas work, then I am pretty sure cause of death was overwork, them japanese work ethics, ya know? that said, donno what posting RIP would do, the dude would rather him be remembered for his works rather than the circumstances of his death. so on that note,

10/10 masterpiece
R.I.P E-musu Aki God bless ur soul
E-Musu Aki is now within the halls of valHalla, and he shall be forever remembered as one of the Finest!
In memorial E-MUSU AKI, your works will always in my favorite list. Rest In Peace
